titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the speedy sending away of the Irish beggers out of this kingdome, into their owne countrey, and for the suppressing and ordering of the English rogues and vagabonds, according to the lawes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and lohn [sic] Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Greenwich, the seuenteenth day of May, in the fift yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 23; Steele notation: num- poore 2) ship- the.
